subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson said he had decided to take the wedge out of play “out of respect” to colleagues, but reserved the right to use it if the PGA Tour could not resolve the rules loophole.
snippet: Phil Mickelson said he had decided to take the wedge out of play “out of respect” to colleagues, but reserved the right to use it if the PGA Tour could not resolve the rules loophole.
